page.title: 06A Vet in 1985
page.content: Today in 1985 vets have a very hard life.They are on call for twenty-four hours a day to treat animals.Today they are called to people's houses more than they work at a surgery. Some of the equipment they use are stethoscopes,stitching wire,syringes and medicines. Nowadays vets need more qualifications than even a doctor.They have to get four or five A levels to get into a veterinary college. They spend five years training. They have lectures about caring for animals. Vets have to be fairly fit.It's just as well because my dad is a vet and once a pig chased him and he had to jump over a wall to escape. Everyone calls vets,vets but their real name is veterinary surgeon.
